summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Spot Trading page functionality. Fixed critical backend URL configuration issue in SpotTradingFresh.js. Backend API is working correctly (75% success rate), but frontend has authentication and API integration issues preventing trading pairs from displaying.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 404 Not Found for authenticated users
minor_bugs.impact: Wallet balances not displayed in trading interface

critical_bugs.issue: Hardcoded API URL pointing to wrong backend
critical_bugs.impact: Trading pairs API calls fail, no pairs displayed
critical_bugs.fix_applied: Changed hardcoded URL to use process.env.REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL

integration_issues.issue: Page redirects to auth when accessing /trading directly
integration_issues.impact: Users cannot access trading page without proper authentication flow

integration_issues.issue: Trading pairs not visible in UI despite backend returning 24 pairs
integration_issues.impact: Core trading functionality not accessible to users
integration_issues.evidence: Backend API returns 24 pairs successfully, but frontend shows empty SELECT TRADING PAIR button

ui_bugs.issue: Order book, place order, and chart interfaces not displaying

passed_tests: Trading Pairs API (/api/trading/pairs) - Returns 24 pairs successfully
User Login API - Working with admin@coinhubx.net credentials
Frontend Page Loading - Spot Trading page structure loads
User Interface - SELECT TRADING PAIR button present
Authentication Flow - Login redirects to dashboard correctly
Site Accessibility - No parking page, actual CoinHubX application loads
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Frontend needs rebuild/redeploy after SpotTradingFresh.js fix. The backend URL configuration was corrected but the live site still uses cached/built version with wrong API endpoints. Also investigate why wallet balances API returns 404 and ensure proper authentication flow for direct trading page access.

detailed_findings.backend_status: Working well - API endpoints responding correctly
detailed_findings.frontend_status: Partially working - UI loads but trading pairs not displaying
detailed_findings.main_blocker: Frontend still connecting to wrong backend URL despite source code fix
detailed_findings.trading_pairs_api: Working - backend returns 24 trading pairs as expected
detailed_findings.ui_components: Present but not fully functional due to API integration issues

recommendations: Rebuild and redeploy frontend to apply SpotTradingFresh.js changes
Fix wallet balances API endpoint (404 error)
Implement proper authentication guards for trading page
Test full trading flow after frontend rebuild
Add error handling for failed API calls in trading interface
